entries.title: Towns to Be Cut Off by Record Flooding in Western Australia
entries.description: A supplied image obtained on Wednesday, Jan. 4, 2023, of floodwaters in the Kimberley region of Western Australia. A remote Western Australian town surrounded by a 100-year flood has become a refuge for hundreds of people evacuated from outlying communities. (AAP Image/Supplied by Andrea Myers)

entries.description: Rescuers gather at the site where a 10-year-old boy is thought to be trapped in a 35-meter deep shaft at a bridge construction area in Vietnam's Dong Thap Province on Jan. 2, 2023. (STR/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Michael Zwaagstra: Students Lose When School Boards Push Woke Navel-Gazing Activities
entries.description: In the child-centred education philosophy, it becomes important to focus inward. However, this philosophy is seriously misguided, and it explains why we are seeing so many school boards descend into woke nonsense and administer surveys that are filled with inappropriate personal questions. It also explains why there is so little emphasis on ensuring that students learn how to read, write, and do basic math. (Monkey Business Images/Shutterstock)

entries.title: 12 Events to Watch for in 2023
entries.description: Oil pump jacks in California on Oct. 5, 2022. (Robyn Beck/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: New Zealand Won’t Require Chinese Arrivals to Show COVID-19 Test
entries.description: Travellers walk with their luggage at the arrival hall of the Hong Kong International Airport on Dec. 30, 2022. Authorities around the world are imposing or considering curbs on travelers from China as COVID-19 cases there surge following its relaxation of zero-COVID rules. (Anthony Kwan/Getty Images)

entries.title: Former US Pilot Received Over $100,000 to Train Chinese Aviators, Indictment Alleges
entries.description: A People’s Liberation Army Navy J-11 fighter pilot performs an unsafe maneuver during an intercept of a U.S. Air Force RC-135 aircraft, which was lawfully conducting routine operations over the South China Sea in international airspace, on Dec. 21, 2022, in a still from video. (Courtesy of U.S. Indo-Pacific Command/Screenshot via The Epoch Times)

entries.title: 1st Tanker Carrying LNG From US Arrives in Germany
entries.description: The tanker "Maria Energy", (L), loaded with liquefied natural gas, is moored at the floating terminal, the special ship "Hoegh Esperanza", in Wilhelmshaven, Germany, on Jan. 3, 2023. (Sina Schuldt/dpa via AP)

entries.title: Pelé Buried at Cemetery in Brazilian City He Made Famous
entries.description: The casket of late Brazilian soccer great Pele is draped in the Brazilian and Santos FC soccer club flags as his remains are transported from Vila Belmiro stadium, where he laid in state, to the cemetery during his funeral procession in Santos, Brazil, on Jan. 3, 2023. (Matias Delacroix/AP Photo)
